form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, Form C-56

full_text: RAI FILE NUMBER A28 670 639 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service 7880 Biscayne Boulevard Miami, Florida 33138 4372 N.W. 7th Street Miami, Florida 33126 SCHOOL STOTIES OCT 1988 Your application or petition will be deemed Juliana Espinoza RECEIVED abandoned and action thereon will be terminated DISTRICT OFFICE If you fail to respond to this request." MIAMI ATTN: FLA. TC/TM/ Nic. (1 ) ANY AUTHORIZATION IMPLIED OR GRANTED FOR EMPLOYMENT WILL BE REVOKED PURSUANT TO TITLE 8, CODE OF FEDERAL REGULATIONS, PART 109,2(a) (b) FIFTEEN (15) DAYS AFTER THE DATE OF THE ABOVE ADPOINTMENT IF YOU FAIL TO APPEAR OR PROVIDE AN ACCEPTABLE REASON WHY SUCH EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZATION SHOULD NOT BE REVOKED. Please come to the office shown below at the time and place indicated in connection with an official matter. OFFICE LOCATION 7880 Biscayne Blvd. Direccion de la oficina Miami, Florida Room No. 420 Floor No. 4th DATE AND HOUR Fecha y hora April 19, 1988 Tues. 9:00 a.m, ASK FOR Pregunte por IMMIGRATION EXAMINER POLITICAL ASYLUM REASON FOR APPOINTMENT Razones por la YOUR FORM - I-589 - REQUEST FOR POLITICAL ASYLUM cita BRING WITH YOU THIS LETTER, DOCUMENTS SUBSTANTIATING YOUR ASYLUM CLAIM, ALL IMMIGRATION Traiga consigo DOCUMENTS, PASSPORTS OF YOU, SPOUSE AND CHILDREN AND TWO(2) PHOTOCOPIES OF ALL DOCUMENTS AND PASSPORTS (EXCEPT BLANK PAGES). A FOREIGN LANGUAGE DOCUMENT MUST BE ACCOMPANIED BY A CERTIFIED ENGLISH TRANSLATION. MINOR CHILDREN NEED NOT COME TO THE INTERVIEW UNLESS MINOR IS THE PRINCIPAL OF THE APPLICATION. PLEASE BRING AN INTERPRETER IF YOU DO NOT SPEAK ENGLISH YOUR INTERVIEW MAY BE TERMINATED IF YOU DO NOT BRING THE REQUIRED TWO (2) PHOTOCOPIES AND ENGLISH TRANSLATIONS. Esta carta; documentos para substanciar su reclamacion; pasaportes de usted, su conyuge, e hijos, todos los documentos de inmigration, debe traer consigo dos fotocopias de todos los documentos y de los pasaportes, excepto las paginas en blanco. (Todo documento en lenguaje extranjero debe de ser traducido al ingles, no traer a menores excepto si son ellos los citados). Si no habla ingles, por favor traer un interprete. Puede ser que su entrevista sea terminado si usted no trae consigo las requeridas dos (2) fotocopias y las traduciones en ingles. IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU KEEP THIS APPOINTMENT AND BRING THIS LETTER WITH YOU. If you are unable to do so, state your reason, sign below and return this letter to this office at once. I am unable to keep the appointment because: Very truly yours, Mrs. Espinoza has been ill ever since the beginning of April. She is 96 years old and requests another appointment. Dr. Thank you very much. District Director SIGNATURE DATE Manuela Romero 10/7/88 Form G-56 (Rev. 5-1-73) N Daughter of Mrs. Juliana Espinoza
